meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of parenchyma.
meanings.sent1: The parenchymal cells in the leaf help in photosynthesis.
meanings.sent2: The doctor observed the parenchymal tissue under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The parenchymal plant cells were having a party in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant and parenchymal as a blooming flower.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the room, creating a parenchymal atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or affecting the parenchyma of an organ or tissue.
meanings.sent1: The MRI showed signs of parenchymal damage in the liver.
meanings.sent2: The medication targeted the parenchymal cells to promote healing.
meanings.sent3: The parenchymal organ decided to take a day off from its functions.
meanings.sent4: His words had a parenchymal impact on her emotional well-being.
meanings.sent5: The storm left a trail of destruction, affecting the parenchymal structure of the forest.
